channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Gallery
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Gallery

item.title: CVE-2023-30725|2024-08-02T14:37:15.266Z -- samsung%20mobile -- gallery
item.description: Improper authentication in LocalProvier of Gallery prior to version 14.5.01.2 allows attacker to access the data in content provider.

item.title: CVE-2023-30724|2024-08-02T14:37:14.661Z -- samsung%20mobile -- gallery
item.description: Improper authentication in GallerySearchProvider of Gallery prior to version 14.5.01.2 allows attacker to access search history.

item.title: CVE-2024-20827|2024-08-01T22:06:36.478Z -- samsung%20mobile -- gallery
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Samsung Gallery prior to version 14.5.04.4 allows physical attackers to access the picture using physical keyboard on the lockscreen.

item.title: CVE-2024-20827|2024-02-06T02:23:17.680Z -- samsung%20mobile -- gallery
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Samsung Gallery prior to version 14.5.04.4 allows physical attackers to access the picture using physical keyboard on the lockscreen.

item.title: CVE-2024-20827|2024-07-05T17:21:30.446Z -- samsung%20mobile -- gallery
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Samsung Gallery prior to version 14.5.04.4 allows physical attackers to access the picture using physical keyboard on the lockscreen.
